file_insights.purpose: Centralized haptics utility for app interaction feedback

patterns_discovered: Graceful error handling for haptic functions
Categorized haptic feedback types (selection, impact, notification)
gotchas_discovered: Web platforms have limited haptic support
Haptics can fail silently (e.g., Low Power Mode)
Need for platform-specific checks before executing haptics
recommendations: Add unit tests for haptic utility functions
Consider creating TypeScript type definitions for haptic events
Document usage guidelines for different haptic feedback types
Potentially add configuration for custom haptic intensities
Monitor performance impact of haptic calls
